p: Another factor influencing IFN actions is the hemoglobin β-chain which was shown to stimulate IFN-β production via RIG-1, including potentiating of RIG-I ubiquitination; hemoglobin is present in lung, kidney, peripheral blood mononuclear and other cell lines ( 38, 85), and SARS-CoV2 nsps can bind to and degrade hemoglobin ( 37).
